data.title: Portugal: population, by region and religion 2021
data.meta_description: The 2021 census showed that, out of almost 8.8 million residents in Portugal aged 15 years and more, over seven million were catholic.
data.text:
Resident population in Portugal 2021, by region and religion

Published by Beatriz Luz,

More information

Region

Portugal

Survey time period

2021

Number of respondents

8,781,900 respondents

Age group

15 years and older

Method of interview

Online survey

Supplementary notes

The values have been rounded.

The majority of respondents answered the 2021 census online. However, other forms of response were possible, namely paper questionnaire and by telephone.
